articles.description: The deal marks Chelsea's first official move into the crypto market, weeks after Liverpool were linked with picking another such firm to replace their main shirt sponsor, Standard Chartered.
articles.content:
Chelsea have announced cryptocurrency firm WhaleFin as their new shirt sleeve sponsors for the 2022-23 campaign.
The Blues confirmed on their official website in the early hours of Saturday morning … [+3868 chars]
